titles: Supplementum sublatum Iohn Tombes, his Supplement, or Second book about swearing disproved and made void and his abusing the Scripture plainly manifested : against which the truth of Christ's words is vindicated and maintained / in a few words briefly returned to him from Richard Hubberthorne and Samuel Fisher.
author: Hubberthorn, Richard, 1628-1662.
Fisher, Samuel, 1605-1665.
Tombes, John, 1603?-1676. Supplement to the serious consideration of the oath of the Kings supremacy.
notes: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
